author: abcoathup
content: <@331819545805324288> this server is for discussion of Ethereum R&D; if you are looking for work at the application layer (as compared with Core Devs) you could try CryptoDevs discord: https://discord.gg/5W5tVb3

author: .coolrunning
content:
I am A **Full Stack Developer with 9 years of experience** in Web development. Great experience in developing several fields such as Sports, Healthcare, B2B, B2C, Fintech, E-Commerce and so on.
Developed the Hiring Meeting & Conference Website for graduates with zoom script, Token Swapping Sites, E-Learning Website for Children, Food Delivery and Ride Ordering Service Websites, Air-Conditioning Company Site, NFT marketplace Websites, NFT landing pages for minting and staking and so on.
Also a rich experience in Blockchain space. Developed the Defi Tokens, NFT tokens, Stake, Airdrop, breed and game contract with Solidity on Ethereum, Polygon, Avalanche, and BSC.
If you need my help, please let me know. Thank you.
